DOC.brief_summary: This study aims to provide class 1 evidence supporting or refuting the existence of normal pressure hydrocephalus.
DOC.brief_title: Conservative Versus Surgical Management of Idiopathic Normal Pressure Hydrocephalus (INPH)
DOC.detailed_description: By comparing one group with active CSF shunting with another with non .
DOC.criteria: Idiopathic Normal pressure Hydrocephalus Alzheimer disease Vascular dementia
